welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Eupen, Belgium! This charming city is known for its beautiful landscapes, rich history, and welcoming locals. We invite you to immerse yourself in all that Eupen has to offer and enjoy every moment of your stay. Happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aachen/Merzbruck Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
